alert.note: Alert for Goochland; Hanover; Henrico; Louisa (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 26 at 2:35PM EDT until July 26 at 3:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 300 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN LOUISA...EAST CENTRAL GOOCHLAND...NORTHWESTERN HENRICO AND WEST CENTRAL HANOVER COUNTIES... At 234 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Oilville, or near Goochland, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. This severe storm will be near... Wyndham around 245 PM EDT. Tuckahoe around 250 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Orchid, Rockville, Dabneys, Gilman, Vontay, Gum Tree, Johnsons Springs, Goodall and Short Pump. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
